sourcesContent:
import { useRouter } from 'next/router'

const port = window.location.port === '3001' ? '3000' : '443'
const protocol = window.location.port === '3001' ? 'http' : 'https'
export const API_ROOT = protocol + '://' + window.location.hostname + ':' + port
export const ROOT_AUTH_URI = process.env.REACT_APP_APIGW + '/auth/oauth/v2'
export const TRUSTED_CLAIMS_URI = process.env.REACT_APP_APIGW + '/auth/oauth/v2/tokeninfo'
export const USER_ROOT = '/api/docudio/v1/groups/'
export const USER_SEARCH_ROOT = '/api/docudio/v1/ldap/users'
// Used strictly for local development and reverse proxying requests
const portlocal = 'window.location.port' === '3001' ? '3000' : '443'
export const NGINX_API_ROOT = 'window.location.protocol' + '//' + 'window.location.hostname' + ':' + portlocal
export const AUTH_PARMS = {
  client_id: '',
  redirect_uri: window.location.protocol + '//' + window.location.hostname + ':' + window.location.port + '/auth',
  code_challenge_method: 'S256',
  response_type: 'code',
  scope: ''
}
